title: Gym Log
description: Web app that helps you track your progress in the gym. Lets you create workouts, exercises and save your lifts. Created with React, it uses Firebase authentication and Firestore as backend.

title: Norris Facts
description: Do you need a Chuck Norris fact but canâ€™t remember any? This web helps you with that. Get a Chuck Norris fact with based on categories.

title: Hex to RGB
description: React web app that converts any six digit HEX color to the RGB equivalent. It also gets you the complementary color.

title: Trivia Game
description: Web trivia game that uses Open Trivia Database API.

title: Contacts
description: Full stack app where you can save contacts. Built with the MERN stack.
